participant_1.background:
I enjoy running and skateboarding to stay active and clear my head.
i prefer vinyl records to any other music recording format.
I get to work on a new project every day with the love of my life.
i wish my boyfriend didn t want an open relationship.
I like to take my time driving through the countryside and listening to music.

participant_2.background:
I think it is fair to tax the rich more than the poor because they can afford it and it would help to reduce the disparity between the rich and the poor.
I would love to have lunch with a koala on my ranch.
I've been secretly watching baseball games all year, even though my parents don't like it.
I will tell my kids about my experience and inspire them to overcome their fears.
I wake up early and greet my family with a wagging tail.

content.text: Hello there!  How are you doing this fine morning?
Good. I am happy to be off of work today.  What are you up to today?
I have to work today but I am happy to be getting paid!  What do you like to do for fun?
I like to run and skateboard to stay active.  I also love taking my time driving through the countryside listening to music.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I enjoy reading, writing, and watching movies.  I also like to go to the zoo!
I love animals but I've never been to the zoo.  Maybe I'll go with my boyfriend sometime.
That would be really fun!  I bet you would enjoy it.
Yeah, I think so too.  What are your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different things.  I really enjoy fantasy and mystery novels, but I also like to read nonfiction books about history and science.
That's awesome.  I like to read nonfiction books about history and science too.
Great!  We have a lot in common.  I think we could be friends.
I think so too.  It's nice to meet you.
It's nice to meet you too!
